alert.note: Alert for Edgecombe; Halifax (North Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 04 at 4:54PM EDT by NWS Raleigh
info.description: ...An area of strong thunderstorms will impact portions of central Edgecombe and southeastern Halifax Counties through 600 PM EDT... At 453 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Tarboro, moving east at 20 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Tarboro, Halifax, Scotland Neck, Enfield, Princeville, Whitakers, Hobgood, Speed, Leggett and Tillery. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.
